### Stock Summary  Table

Field definitions for the Stock Summary table


```{r sample, echo= F, message=FALSE}
library(readr)
stksmry <- read_csv("stksmrytbl.csv")

stksmry %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling() %>%
   column_spec(1, width = "1.6in")


```
